item.description:
Hi folks! We have a place to meet!
Join us as Richard Wang presents on how social will affect nonprofit organizations in the midst of economic recession and changing fundraising landscape.
Richard's aim is to increase your awareness of the value of social media and how to use it to catalyse your mission. He will provide a look inside several high profile social media examples and discuss risks and opportunities associate with social media. He'll conclude with the concrete benefits he's seen personally from organizations that have embraced social media.

We'll see you next Tuesday!

~Monique
item.name: An inside look at social media and its impact to nonprofit landscape
